original_title: Pig Tales - Puffed Up Piglets & Time for a Change
overview: In Puffed Up Piglets pride gets in the way of cooperation when the piglets are commissioned to find Daria's baby blanket. In Time for a Change Sebastian's use of his time machine is not nearly as effective as taking the time to help Plague understand why Sandy Squirrel must store so many acorns.
title: Pig Tales Vol. 3: Puffed Up Piglets & Time for A Change
